results.name: Destroy All Humans! Big Willy Unleashed

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.5 GHZ
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1MB video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 520 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Single Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2004 GPU
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

  • OS: Ubuntu 10.12
  • Processor: Intel Multi Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2010 GPU
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: SM3 512MB VRAM

  • Additional Notes: Requires a controller to play

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD FX4350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 960 / AMD 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

Vista SP2 / 7 / 8 / 10
Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
Memory: 4 GB RAM
Graphics: GeForce 400 or higher, AMD Radeon HD 4000 or higher, Intel HD 4000 or higher (DirectX 11 hardware support required)
DirectX: Version 11
Hard Drive: 4 GB available space
Sound Card: DirectX compatible
Mouse, Keyboard
requirements_en.recommended:
Vista SP2 / 7 / 8 / 10
Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad Core CPU
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: GeForce 500 or higher, AMD Radeon HD 5000 or higher
